title: Heirloom Polki Pendant with Amethyst Centerpiece and Pearl Drops
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polished gold finish.
features: This exquisite pendant showcases a traditional South Indian floral motif crafted with meticulous detail. The openwork design is meticulously encrusted with Polki diamonds in a closed setting, creating a dazzling play of light. A captivating teardrop-shaped Amethyst forms the centerpiece, adding a touch of regal elegance. Dangling pearl drops soften the design, providing a delicate and feminine appeal.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Equally suitable for adding a touch of heritage to a modern ensemble.
description: This pendant is a true heirloom piece, showcasing the timeless beauty of Polki diamonds and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The unique color combination and delicate pearl drops add a contemporary twist to this classic design. A symbol of elegance and prosperity, it's an investment in lasting beauty.
